name: Tower Crawl (Ugly Duckling Games)
description:
Tower Crawl includes fun arcade action in an infinite randomly generated tower.

-Play as Christopher "Boom Dude" Wood as he assaults B.A.C.O.N tower, destroying countless mass produced imitation humans that were made for nothing but to kill.

-Use his trusty Desert Eagle to blow your enemies to pieces and ascend the tower.

-Place pressure activating tripmines that will see your enemies painting the walls.

-Collect powerups, health and ammunition as you battle.

-Use the environment to your advantage by hurling nearby explosive barrels into unsuspecting foes.

-Fight multiple enemies which will send you running for more ammo.

-Ascend infinite floors, limited only by how long you survive.

-Play it again to try and get the best high score that you possibly can.

CONTROLS

-WASD to move

-Space to shoot

-Q to place landmines

-E to enter elevator

B.A.C.O.N (Bureau of Associations and Communications Over Nations) are a company that controls the world. They preach freedom and good leadership, but practise abuse and oppression. Some wish they could rebel, but little have the bravery to do so, and those that do are killed without so much as a struggle.

Christopher "Boom Dude" Wood is not one to be brought down by the likes of violence and oppression. For years he has planned his assault on B.A.C.O.N tower, the central hub for B.A.C.O.N's empire. He has dabbled in dark rituals and experimental science, achieving the closest a mortal can come to immortality. On consumption of his special blue mayonnaise, his body flares into a bright blue hellflame and his Desert Eagle supercharges and gains an infinite stockpile of ammo. Long ago he even managed to achieve a symbiotic relationship with his trusty gun.

Christopher knows he can bring down the tower, but should he be so sure?
